title: Sleep Headphones, 3D Sleep Mask Bluetooth Wireless Music Eye Mask, LC-dolida Sleeping Headphones for Side Sleepers Sleep Mask with Bluetooth Headphones Ultra-Thin Stereo Speakers Perfect for Sleeping
descriptions:
Introducing the Sleep Headphones, 3D Sleep Mask Bluetooth Wireless Music Eye Mask by LC-dolida. This innovative product combines the functionality of sleep headphones, a Bluetooth sleep mask, and a sleep eye mask, making it the ultimate sleep companion for side sleepers.

With a Bluetooth version of 5.2 and a wireless range of 45 feet, these sleep headphones are compatible with most Bluetooth-enabled devices, ensuring a seamless connection. The HD stereo sound quality delivers an immersive audio experience, allowing you to enjoy your favorite music or audiobooks while you drift off to sleep.

The battery life of these sleep headphones is impressive, with a charging time of just 1-2 hours and a playtime of 8-10 hours. This means you can enjoy uninterrupted relaxation throughout the night without worrying about the battery running out.

The mask design is specially crafted for side sleepers, with a contoured and 3D ergonomic fit that provides zero pressure on the eyes. The adjustable strap ensures a comfortable and secure fit for any head size.

Made from memory foam and soft fabric, the sleep headphones are cool, comfortable, and breathable. The hypoallergenic material makes them suitable for even the most sensitive skin. Additionally, the mask design provides perfect light blockage, creating a soothing and dark environment for a peaceful sleep.

These sleep headphones are ideal for various scenarios, including insomnia, air travel, meditation, yoga, migraine headaches, and dry-eye sufferers. They are suitable for everyone, including men, women, teens, girls, boys, dads, and moms.

Not only are these sleep headphones practical, but they also make great gifts. Suitable for occasions such as Christmas, Valentine's Day, Halloween, Easter, birthdays, Mother's Day, Fathers' Day, and Teachers' Day, they are a unique and thoughtful present for your loved ones.

Experience the ultimate comfort and relaxation with the Sleep Headphones, 3D Sleep Mask Bluetooth Wireless Music Eye Mask by LC-dolida. Say goodbye to sleepless nights and welcome a restful and rejuvenating sleep.
